data.event: Margate was recorded as "Meregate" in 1264 and as "Margate" in 1299, but the spelling continued to vary into modern times.
Margate was recorded as "Meregate" in 1264 and as "Margate" in 1299, but the spelling continued to vary into modern times.

event.title: was largely destroyed by a storm in 1978

data.event: Margate had a Victorian pier which was largely destroyed by a storm in 1978.
